WorkItem.Description: On starting Rawr, just 1 sec after the loading screen opens, I get this pop-up (see attatch), then Rawr closes. Not sure if this has happened for anyone else but, sure is annoying!

Comments.Message:
Hmm... Haven't seen that specific error before, but I'd guess you need to fully unzip Rawr to somewhere on your HD that you have full permissions too. You also might be running on an *extremely* limited permissions user account (ie, can't even write a prefs file?) or something?

Let me know if none of that helps, and I'll research it some more.

Nah I had definitly already redownloaded - unzipped 3 times, and was running it on the administrator account, and even right-click + open as admin... to no avail.. but 2.1.8 seems to've fixed the problem :)!
